```{r}
# comment
data(iris) # <1>
x <- 0 # <2>
for(i in seq_along(iris$Sepal.Width)){ # <3>
    x <- x + 1 # <3>
} # <3>
print(x)
```
1. Load the iris dataset
2. Create a variable x and assign it the value 0
3. Loop through the Sepal.Width column of the iris dataset and increment x by 1 for each value
